Package org.logevents.formatting

Interface LogEventFormatter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Function<LogEvent,​String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleLogEventFormatter, PatternLogEventFormatter, TTLLEventLogFormatter
    public interface LogEventFormatter
extends Function<LogEvent,​String>
    Represents a strategy for converting a LogEvent to a string.
    Author:
    Johannes Brodwall
